prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a large shell and sharp teeth.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur with a rugged shell and powerful limbs.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with a thick, armored body and a fierce expression.
Make a Pokemon that features a unique blend of blue and yellow colors with a prehistoric look.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a strong connection to the sea and a tough exterior.
Design a creature that stands low to the ground, combining elements of a turtle and a dinosaur.
Show me a Pokemon with a strong defensive nature and a vibrant turquoise color.
